2025-12-06T08:03:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that to facilitate the arrangements for the Legislative Council General Election on 7 December, train service of most MTR lines will start earlier on Sunday to facilitate polling staff to get to their assigned polling stations for preparations. 
For details, please refer to MTRCL website.
2025-12-06T08:03:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，為配合12月7日立法會換屆選舉的安排，大部份綫路會於星期日早上提早開出頭班車，以便票站人員前往票站作準備。
詳情請參閱港鐵公司網頁。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Train Services for Kai Tak Sports Park
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 前往啟德體育園的列車服務

2025-12-06T12:10:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that concerts will be held at Kai Tak Sports Park in the evenings of 6 and 7 December. Passengers can reach the venue from either Kai Tak or Sung Wong Toi stations. Passengers are advised to arrive early to avoid large crowds before the show starts. 
After the show, train frequency will be enhanced as necessary. 
If passengers need to cross the boundary, please note the departure times of the last trains connecting to Lo Wu:
For more details, please visit: https://www.td.gov.hk/en/special_news/spnews.htm.
2025-12-06T12:10:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，啟德體育園於12月6及7日晚上舉行演唱會，前往觀賞的乘客可使用啟德或宋皇臺站。開場前客流或會較多，建議乘客預早到達。
散場時，港鐵公司會按需要加密列車班次。
需要過境的乘客，請留意往羅湖尾班車時間：
詳情請參看: https://www.td.gov.hk/tc/special_news/spnews.htm。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park now full
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿

2025-12-06T13:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-12-06T13:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。

2025-12-07T14:07:00.CONTENT_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-12-07T14:07:00.CONTENT_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。
